enquiry-reason.required: What is your enquiry related to?

enquiry-reason-other.required: Tell us the reason you want to get in touch

email.email: Enter your email in the correct format, for example name@domain.com

phone.phonenumber: Enter your phone number in the correct format, for example 020 7946 0937 or 07700 900579

outside-uk.equal: Please select a country from the list

uk-postcode.postcode: Enter your postcode in the correct format, for example SW1A 1AA

exported-before.required: Tell us if you have sold products or services to customers overseas

org-type.required: Choose what type of company you are

sector.equal: Please select an industry from the list
